short_summary: Risk Management Specialist Title: Risk Management Specialist Location: Ottawa, Ontario Number of Contracts: 1 Requirement Details: tendering Procedure: Selective tendering The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal: IDOR Visa ...
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency requires the services of a Risk Management Specialist to support and provide expert advice for the creation of risk reports for the Risk and Analytics Divison.
